name: Too Many Bullets
description:
Short story:

A strange fellow named Fingerhead woke up with the ability to shoot bullets out of his hands.  Waves of hostile creatures came out of nowhere with this same odd power, destroying everything he knew. He found out the source of his power - Hell. Do you have what it takes to defeat the monster which lies beneath?...

Game information:

Too Many Bullets by Rhysimus for The Indie Games Lab Jam #3

Theme: Bullet Hell

Credits:
  • Pixel art Background pack by Jakab Varga
  • Free Pixel Font - Thaleah by Tiny Worlds
  • Pixel Adventure 1 & 2 by Pixel-Frog
  • Sunnyland by Ansimuz
  • Platformer Game Music Pack by CodeManu
  • Panda Siege and Bonney for hosting
  • To everyone at the Indie Games Lab, and you!
